instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL: npm install framer-motion react-tsparticles tsparticles-engine tsparticles-slim lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge
FONT: Add '@fontsource/chakra-petch' and '@fontsource/rajdhani' or import from Google Fonts in index.css
THEME: Force DARK MODE. Do not implement light mode toggle.
PARTICLES: Config 'links' to true to create the spider-web effect. Color: #ffffff (opacity 0.2).
TELEGRAM: Use actual buttons, not just icons. Label them 'Join Channel 1', 'Join Channel 2'.
LOGO: Use the provided placeholder image but treat it as the 'Metallic A'. animate it to float.
NO SHADCN: Build custom components using Tailwind to match the unique aesthetic. Shadcn is too standard.
CRITICAL: Do not ask user for clarification. Use your best judgment to fill gaps.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Use data-testid for all interactive elements.
